description: It's time to shift into high gear! Put on the Pit Stoppers skin and jazz up Rabbid Mario's Dukes. Shine with this all-new bodywork: two-color stripes, pneumatic coating, and motorized propulsion systems. Make all your foes bite the dust in style in Mario + Rabbids® Sparks of Hope!
name: MARIO + RABBIDS® SPARKS OF HOPE - RABBID MARIO PIT STOPPERS SKIN
